DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses VAK694 Atopic Subjects With Seasonal Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 60 good health History atopy least 2 year positive skin prick test ragweed allergen Exclusion criterion : History asthma treat corticosteroid Smokers smoke history > 10 pack/years smoke past year History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
